hero.description: Efficio AI is your end-to-end automation platform—no dev team needed. Streamline repetitive workflows, sync your favorite apps, and reclaim hours of manual work every week.

features.title: Accurate Object Detection
features.description: Our AI precisely identifies and counts architectural elements with 99.8% accuracy.

features.title: Automated Measurements
features.description: Automatically calculate dimensions and sizes of all detected objects in your architectural plans.

features.title: Real-time Analysis
features.description: Process architectural drawings and 3D models in real-time with instant feedback and results.

features.title: Detailed Reports
features.description: Generate comprehensive reports with object counts, measurements, and visual annotations.

features.title: Cloud Integration
features.description: Seamlessly integrate with popular cloud storage and architectural software platforms.

features.title: Collaboration Tools
features.description: Share results with team members and clients with built-in collaboration features.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Our streamlined process makes architectural object counting and sizing effortless

steps.title: Upload Your Plans

steps.title: AI Processing
steps.description: Our advanced AI algorithms analyze your plans to identify and count all architectural objects.

steps.description: The system automatically calculates dimensions and sizes of all detected objects.
